title: DigitalMonk
author: DigitalMonk
content: The Ex Chancellor Rishi Sunak is a C++ Coder and Computer scientist. He is a credible person in the UK government. His billionaire wife also a computer programmer. Her father and mother both are computer scientist and programers. When Rishi Sunak was studying in California in 2006, my venerable friend invited him to return to UK and inspired him to contribute his knowledge and expertise to the government. Finally after many years he became the Chancellor. Doesn't it prove that Rishi Sunak is a good candidate for Satoshi Nakamoto ?

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on September 20, 2022, 08:35:20 PMDoesn't it prove that Rishi Sunak is a good candidate for Satoshi Nakamoto ? Enough of all these, when are you going to wise up to wake up from your slumber, thousands of people have been calling themselves faketoshi and if you're coming here to tell us about some concuction stories for the gods here regarding wjat you don't know about bitcoin than listening to every piece of trash calling themselves Satoshi, then i think you Rishi Sunak should take position behind thousands of people that have said so in the past, enough of faketoshi theorem.

comments.author: Lanatsa
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on September 20, 2022, 08:35:20 PMThe Ex Chancellor Rishi Sunak is a C++ Coder and Computer scientist. He is a credible person in the UK government. His billionaire wife also a computer programmer. Her father and mother both are computer scientist and programers. When Rishi Sunak was studying in California in 2006, my venerable friend invited him to return to UK and inspired him to contribute his knowledge and expertise to the government. Finally after many years he became the Chancellor. Doesn't it prove that Rishi Sunak is a good candidate for Satoshi Nakamoto ? Having those qualities or being simply a Billionaire and a C++ coder and a comsci does automatically be considered to be a candidate as Satoshi?They could have all those pile of skills and degrees but it wont be enough for them to be considered to be one.As long no one would able to move out those funds or coins into those early Satoshi wallet addresses then these people wouldbe considered as Faketoshis.

comments.author: DigitalMonk
comments.body: Quote from: Mbitr on September 20, 2022, 08:38:44 PM[You are a very good Bitcoin evangelist. Why can't you respect a Monk like myself ?Â  Remember that I am not an ordinary monk but Divital Monk. There beware that you may not know that my post is not trolling. It is myÂ  nomination of a new candidate. If you have any say then speak politely with understanding other wise I can ask Dr Rev WrightÂ  to file case against you as you are violating the principles of Bitcoin Talk Forum. In Bitcoin Talk Forum we need every walk of people. So if some one is a troll they have right to troll. Who are you to judge ?

comments.author: famososMuertos
comments.body: We are in season of identities for SN, the candidates are... a few days ago someone mentioned the mysterious candidate, other for the umpteenth time, everyone can have their placebo idea of who he is... there is a platonic love with that idea of giving SN an identity when he really already has it.Rishi Sunak is a good candidate for Satoshi Nakamoto ?Yeah...well maybe not.

comments.author: lalabotax
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on September 20, 2022, 08:35:20 PMDoesn't it prove that Rishi Sunak is a good candidate for Satoshi Nakamoto ? Candidate? Is it a contest of being a Satoshi? Â There is nothing to do between Rishi and Satoshi, there is no proof that Rishi was doing something the same as Satoshi did. Having family members who are experts on computers, doesn't mean probably having the same thoughts as Satoshi. It's not just about expertise in computers or coding, but how someone has a big vision of the world's financial system. As long as you cannot prove to us that Rishi ever stated an idea about digital money for the future era, claiming Rishi as a Satoshi is a too wild idea.

comments.author: Detritus
comments.created_time: September 20, 2022, 11:46:33 PMLast edit: September 21, 2022, 08:38:18 AM by Detritus
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on September 20, 2022, 08:35:20 PMHer father and mother both are computer scientist and programers.Rishi Sunakâ€™s father was a general practitioner for the National Health Service and His mother (Sunak's mother) a pharmacist who owned and operated a small pharmacy. They were no programers nor computer scientist.Read here: https://www.britannica.com/biography/Rishi-Sunak

comments.author: odolvlobo
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on September 20, 2022, 08:35:20 PMThe Ex Chancellor Rishi Sunak is a C++ Coder ... Doesn't it prove that Rishi Sunak is a good candidate for Satoshi Nakamoto ? By your criteria, there are thousands of people who could be a good candidate because being well-known does not make someone a better candidate.

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Wow, this is quite a reach and without much meat.Â  I think your intents were good as you have people chiming in, but instead of pinpointing a selection for who Satoshi is, you just expanded the pool by a couple/few million.

comments.author: DapanasFruit
comments.body: To answer your proposition simply, no it does not! Why? Because there are so many other people that may have the same or even better qualifications under different circumstances and yet they are not nor will ever be Satoshi Nakamoto. Now, this is my first time to hear the name of Rishi Sunak and if ever this man is going to learn that somebody is connecting his name to be the Bitcoin founder then am sure he will be amused with the idea. Therefore, this is just another entertaining concept for us to consume for free.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Come to think of it, I'm also a computer major, and I have a crap ton of programmer buddies. Damn I could actually be Satoshi Nakamoto as well! ðŸ¤¯

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on September 20, 2022, 08:35:20 PMThe Ex Chancellor Rishi Sunak is a C++ Coder and Computer scientist. He is a credible person in the UK government. His billionaire wife also a computer programmer. ~So, you are saying that this person is a good candidate for Satoshi Nakamoto just because he is a good C++ Code and a Computer Scientist.I'm good at C++, I also have some friends who is also a good C++ coder and I also know some people who are computer programmers. Can you include them in the candidates for Satoshi Nakamoto?Enough of this thing and let's just forget who Satoshi Nakamoto is.

comments.author: avikz
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on September 20, 2022, 08:35:20 PMThe Ex Chancellor Rishi Sunak is a C++ Coder and Computer scientist. He is a credible person in the UK government. His billionaire wife also a computer programmer. Her father and mother both are computer scientist and programers. When Rishi Sunak was studying in California in 2006, my venerable friend invited him to return to UK and inspired him to contribute his knowledge and expertise to the government. Finally after many years he became the Chancellor. Doesn't it prove that Rishi Sunak is a good candidate for Satoshi Nakamoto ? There are millions of C++ programmers available in the world. By your logic, everyone is a potential candidate for Satoshi Nakamoto. What a great non-sense! Rishi Sunak belongs to the league of billionaires. He doesn't need bitcoin or any other cryptocurrency. By your logic, then should I understand that UK government is the creator of bitcoin?

comments.author: DigitalMonk
comments.body: Previously, many people were thought to be Satoshi Nakamoto. After many years, no body actually claim to be Satoshi until 2014. Then latter Craig Wright managed to convinced the BBC to publish his claiming news. It was debunked by the Cryptocurrency community. Thereafter, James Belal Caan publicly claimed to be Satoshi Nakamoto. I am here just nominated Rishi Sunak as possible good candidate of Satoshi Nakamoto. No, Rishi Sunak was not in government in 2007 to 2009.Â  As some one has conducted a conclusive research that bitcoin was invented by Satoshi Nakamoto from London and he probably was living in London. If you think that there more people out there with computer science and Cryptographic knowledge, then you can propose their name on the Satoshi Nakamoto candidate list. You think you could be a candidate yourself, please come forward like all those Faketoshi and claim it. Then prove it cryptographically if you are zenuine.

comments.author: len01
comments.body: i've read this sort of thing a few times and for some reason some people out there are hunting for satoshi and maybe claiming to be satoshi.never mind bro stop talking about satoshi and it's very unlikely it's better for you to buy bitcoin and collect as much as possible so you can get rich with your bitcoin assets.when it comes to C++, there are lots of smart programmers and some of them know about bitcoin. but they have no desire to be satoshi candidates.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Absolutely no chance in my opinion, I absolutely do not believe it likely that Sunak is Satoshi. He doesnâ€™t seem the type to be such a pioneer, heâ€™s just a cog in the fiat elite wheel.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on September 20, 2022, 08:35:20 PMDoesn't it prove that Rishi Sunak is a good candidate for Satoshi Nakamoto ? These are very unnecessary details that you are concerning yourself with IMO. Why do people keep worrying themselves about the identity of Satoshi, is it going to change anything? I think there are better things to focus on OP like how to align yourself to be a beneficiary of bitcoin than concerning your with unnecessary details like Satoshi's identity that so much has been vested to conceal. Don't loose focus!

comments.author: Zilon
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on September 20, 2022, 08:35:20 PMWhen Rishi Sunak was studying in California in 2006, my venerable friend invited him to return to UK and inspired him to contribute his knowledge and expertise to the government. Finally after many years he became the Chancellor. Doesn't it prove that Rishi Sunak is a good candidate for Satoshi Nakamoto ? Op i will like to get you clear did satoshi ever mentioned to anyone he studied in California before he went anonymous? Or is there a documentary about Satoshi Moving to UK and becoming a chancellor the world never knew?. It's high time we bring an end to this search for who Satoshi really is and focus more on contributing our quota to seeing the p2p idea gets more adoptionFeeding the public with some bunch of irrelevant information about the true identity of a selfless fellow who chose to remain forever anonymous will only cause some FUD in the minds of new bitcoin converts. Any one can code in C++ and anyone can have a family of programmers. Satoshi Nakamoto only exists in the Bitcoin we hodl spend and trade nothing more
